formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'OSPAuth' =-
[Synopsis] OSP authentication
[Description] OSPAuth([provider[,options]]): Authenticate a SIP INVITE by OSP and sets the variables: ${OSPINHANDLE}: The inbound call transaction handle ${OSPINTIMELIMIT}: The inbound call duration limit in seconds
This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: OSPAUTHSTATUS The status of the OSP Auth attempt as a text string, one of SUCCESS | FAILED | ERROR

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
